project_metadata.project_name: Synthetic Data Generation for Imbalanced Classification

executive_summary.problem_statement: Addressing class imbalance in fraud detection using generative AI
executive_summary.key_achievement: Improved F1-score by 45.6% using synthetic data

methodology_overview.evaluation_framework: Statistical testing and business impact analysis

key_findings.synthetic_data_quality: All methods produced statistically valid synthetic data
